## AUDIENCES

### Existing Graduate Students

Graduate students enrolled at the UI can add the certificate to their degree plan.  Courses can count toward the degree plan and the certificate.

Specific programs that are synergistic with the certificate include:

MS or PHD in Bioinformatics and Computational Biology.
Masters in Public Administration.
